thread.title: 'Dangerous thug' indicted on 13 felonies in 2-city crime spree
thread.title_full: 'Dangerous thug' indicted on 13 felonies in 2-city crime spree

author: Carol Robinson | crobinson@al.com
title: 'Dangerous thug' indicted on 13 felonies in 2-city crime spree
text: Edwin Gabriel Hosea Conley is facing six counts of burglary, three counts of robbery, two counts of kidnapping and two counts of theft. He is also charged with the misdemeanor crimes of illegal possession of prescription drugs, criminal mischief, disorderly conduct and animal cruelty, the latter charged filed because he shot of the leg of one of his victim's pets.
